resources.string: This service allows Tether to automatically enable the selected tether mode. It only runs in the settings menu after the Tethr app has been enabled.

Tethr requires the use of an accessibility service to work. The accessibility service is used to automatically toggle tethering in the system settings at just the right time. Please enable the Tethr Auto Enable accessibility service to enable this automation. \n\n If your device has a boot password enabled, enabling an accessibility service may temporarily disable it. If this happens, just go back into your system settings after enabling the service to re-enable the boot password.
